title: A Life Lost, Lives Saved: The Magnus White Cyclist Safety Act Aims to Protect the Most Vulnerable
content:
The proposed legislation would require auto manufacturers to implement automatic emergency braking systems that can detect cyclists, pedestrians, and other vulnerable road users.

Read the full article at A Life Lost, Lives Saved: The Magnus White Cyclist Safety Act Aims to Protect the Most Vulnerable on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
